meta.title: on
meta.description: Listens for data transactions at a particular location.

query.name: c
query.description: You can subscribe to multiple dataStores using the list of array. The child array contains `path` and `ts` (`[path,ts]`), `path` is the dataStore path and `ts` is the latest timestamp you got data. you need to update `ts` and send another request every time you get data.

path.name: event
path.description: Listens for data transactions at a particular location. Your callback will be triggered whenever the data transactions.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The array contains `ts`, `id`, `v`(`[ts, id, v]`). `ts` is the timestamp, `id` is the unique ID and `v` is the data value.
